entry.title: Extending MediatR with publishing strategies
entry.summary: Explore advanced publishing strategies with the MediatR library in .NET applications. This article describes how to extend the MediatR library to support custom strategies while publishing notifications. Learn how to implement, register, and use these strategies with ease in your .NET projects.
